# El Salvador Billie Jean King Cup team

The El Salvador Billie Jean King Cup team represents El Salvador in tennis Billie Jean King Cup competition and are governed by the Federaci√≥n Salvadorena de Tenis. They have not competed since 2013.
History
El Salvador competed in its first Fed Cup in 1992. Their best result was reaching the Group I promotion play-offs in 2003 and 2004.
